SENT.plain: The purpose of the study was determination of the incidence of arteriospasm in the brain in relation to the time after the last bleeding to the time of angiography
The authors analysed 209 cases of bleeding in which one-time angiography of the carotid arteries was done
In 45% of cases arteriospasm was found
The lowest incidence of arteriospasm was observed 1-3 days after the last bleeding, and highest on days 7-9 after this bleeding
